meta.description: GNU Binutils, tools for manipulating binaries (linker, assembler, etc.)
meta.long_description:
The GNU Binutils are a collection of binary tools.  The main
ones are `ld' (the GNU linker) and `as' (the GNU assembler).
They also include the BFD (Binary File Descriptor) library,
`gprof', `nm', `strip', etc.
meta.name: binutils

meta.description: Tools for manipulating binaries (linker, assembler, etc.)

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later
